Package it.polimi.se2019.model

Class Match

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.Match
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DominationMatch, NormalMatch
    public abstract class Match
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for all the information of the Match being played. Abstract class, supporting common logic in the different modes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Board board
      Board used for the Match
      protected int currentPlayer
      Index of the player whose turn is the current
      protected boolean finalFrenzy
      If True, the activated mode is finalFrenzy
      protected int firstPlayer
      Index of the firstPlayer
      protected java.util.List<Player> players
      List of players playing the match
      protected java.util.Random rand  
      (package private) java.util.List<SpawnPlayer> spawnPoints
      Helper attribute that keeps track of the Domination Spawn players
      protected boolean turnEnd
      True if player turn has ended
      protected UpdateSender updateSender
      Sender used to send updates to players in the match

        Manage the change to frenzy mode Update the actions available for each player Update the reward points given by each player

      • newTurn

        public boolean newTurn()
        Manage the start of a new turn Score the board of dead players Add the points for double kill (domination spawn kill doesn't count) Refresh Board.weaponsDeck and Board.ammoCards on the board Start Frenzy if conditions are met
        Returns:
        true if match is finished

      • scorePlayerBoard

        public void scorePlayerBoard​(Player player)
        Score personal Player Board when the corresponding Player is dead or match is ended Check and score the first blood if Player.firstShotReward is TRUE Score the damage of each player accordingly to the rules, following the Player.rewardPoints and giving a minimum of 1 points to every shooter Score for overkill
        Parameters:
        player - player to score
